Uses of Interface
se.litsec.opensaml.saml2.metadata.provider.MetadataProvider

  • Packages that use MetadataProvider 
    Package Description
    se.litsec.opensaml.saml2.metadata.provider
    Providers for downloading and maintaining metadata from a federation or IdP.
    se.litsec.opensaml.saml2.metadata.provider.spring
    Metadata provider classes that requires Spring Framework.
    se.litsec.opensaml.xmlsec
    Utility classes for working with XML Security (signatures and encryption/decryption).

    • Uses of MetadataProvider in se.litsec.opensaml.saml2.metadata.provider

      Classes in se.litsec.opensaml.saml2.metadata.provider that implement MetadataProvider 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractMetadataProvider
      Abstract base class for the MetadataProvider interface.
      class  CompositeMetadataProvider
      A metadata provider that collects its metadata from multiple sources (providers).
      class  FilesystemMetadataProvider
      A metadata provider that reads its metadata from a file.
      class  HTTPMetadataProvider
      A provider that downloads metadata from a HTTP resource.
      class  ProxyMetadataProvider
      A metadata provider that is constructed by assigning an OpenSAML MetadataResolver instance.
      class  StaticMetadataProvider
      A MetadataProvider that is given an object representing SAML metadata (EntityDescriptor or EntitiesDescriptor).
      Constructor parameters in se.litsec.opensaml.saml2.metadata.provider with type arguments of type MetadataProvider 
      Constructor and Description
      CompositeMetadataProvider(String id, List<MetadataProvider> metadataProviders)
      Constructs a composite metadata provider by assigning it a list of provider instances that it shall read its metadata from.

    • Uses of MetadataProvider in se.litsec.opensaml.saml2.metadata.provider.spring

      Classes in se.litsec.opensaml.saml2.metadata.provider.spring that implement MetadataProvider 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  SpringResourceMetadataProvider
      Utility class that accepts a Spring Framework Resource as the metadata source.

    • Uses of MetadataProvider in se.litsec.opensaml.xmlsec

      Constructors in se.litsec.opensaml.xmlsec with parameters of type MetadataProvider 
      Constructor and Description
      SAMLObjectEncrypter(MetadataProvider metadataProvider)
      Sets up the object encrypter with a metadata provider from where we find the peer credentials.
